Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Reroute at Grand/Kenton
ShortDescription: 65 Grand buses are temp. rerouted in both directions via Grand, Cicero, North Ave., and Grand over normal route, due to a street blockage near Grand/Kenton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Grand, Cicero, North Ave., and Grand over normal route, due to a street blockage near Grand/Kenton.

Allow extra travel time.
